ValidationRule.description: Discretionary request must be associated to an Opportunity.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), text( SBU__c ) = "D&S", text( CBT__c ) <> "HTSI", Campaign__c <> Null, Left( Owner__r.UserRole.Name , 6 ) <> "D&S TS", Left( $UserRole.Name , 6 ) <> "D&S TS" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Discretionary request must be associated to an Opportunity, not a campaign.
